doc:
Adrian Pasdar https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adrian_Pasdar 0 Adrian Pasdar (born April 30, 1965) is an American actor and voice artist. He is known for playing Jim Profit on the TV series Profit, for his roles in Near Dark, Carlito's Way, Mysterious Ways and as Nathan Petrelli on Heroes. Additionally, he directed the feature film Cement. Pasdar is the voice of Iron Man in Marvel Anime, as well as in the animated series, Ultimate Spider-Man and Avengers Assemble(seasons 1-3). He also played Alec Rybak, district attorney on The Lying Game and had a recurring role as Glenn Talbot / Graviton on Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.. Adrian_Pasdar ( born April_30_,_1965 ) is an_American_actor_and_voice_artist . He is_known for playing_Jim_Profit on the_TV_series_Profit , for his_roles in Near Dark , Carlito 's_Way , Mysterious_Ways and as Nathan_Petrelli on Heroes . Additionally , he directed the_feature_film_Cement . Pasdar is the_voice of Iron_Man in Marvel_Anime , as_well_as in the_animated_series , Ultimate_Spider-Man and Avengers_Assemble ( seasons 1-3_) . He also played Alec_Rybak , district_attorney on The_Lying_Game and had a_recurring_role as Glenn_Talbot / Graviton on Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. .
